title: Weather App
desc: This project is made using Openweathermap API where you can get the weather details of your city by just entering the name of your city.

title: CodeStock IDE
desc: In this Project I have made A Code Editor where you can compile your code in multiple languages like C,C++,C#,Python etc. You can also Download Youe code in specific file type.

title: Blog Website
desc: In this project i have made a website where you can write blogs and share them with the whole world..
